title: Meet Sachin Katti: IIT Bombay alumnus who left Intel as AI chief after 6 months to join OpenAI
description: IIT Bombay graduate Sachin Katti has stepped down from his position as Intel’s head of artificial intelligence to take up a role at OpenAI.
content: While the IT industry is laying off employees left, right and center, the AI industry is on a hiring spree. To elaborate, several big tech companies like Meta, Google, Apple and AI startups like OpenAI, Perplexity are hiring AI skilled talent. One su... [1994 chars]

title: New AI system manages satellite attitude in orbit for first time
description: A significant breakthrough has been achieved by the research team at Julius-Maximilinas-Universitat Wurzburg in the use of Artificial Intelligence to control the attitude controller for satellites...
content:
A significant breakthrough has been achieved by the research team at Julius-Maximilinas-Universitat Wurzburg (JMU) in the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to control the attitude controller for satellites directly in orbit for the first time.

title: Tech Gaint Solution Pvt. Ltd. Officially Launches WOOOW AI
description: New Delhi [India], November 11: In a defining moment for India's digital transformation journey, Tech Gaint Solution Pvt. Ltd. (TGSPL) has officially launched WOOOW AI, its flagship All-in-One Artificial Intelligence platform, marking a major milestone in the vision of Aatmanirbhar Bharat and Startup India. The launch event, hosted virtually, witnessed participation from creators, entrepreneurs, and technology enthusiasts across India and abroad -- uniting under the common goal of democratizing AI for every citizen.

title: Canada needs guidelines for AI use in financial advice, report says
description: Artificial intelligence could play a key role in helping Canadians make smarter financial decisions, C.D. Howe Institute report says

title: Elon Musk’s Curiosity For Lord Ganesha Wins Hearts Of Indian Fans
description: Elon Musk is winning hearts online after he shared a post featuring Lord Ganesha. The Tesla and SpaceX chief posted a screenshot of his interaction with Grok, the AI chatbot developed by his artificial intelligence company xAI. In the post, he asked the AI bot to identify an image of Lord Ganesha. Grok correctly recognised the deity and described Lord Ganesha as a widely revered Hindu god.
